metalign.beat.hmm

Class HmmBeatTrackingModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.generic.MidiModelState
      • metalign.beat.BeatTrackingModelState
        • metalign.beat.hmm.HmmBeatTrackingModelState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MidiModelState>

    public class HmmBeatTrackingModelState
extends BeatTrackingModelState
    An HmmBeatTrackingModelState is an hmm model which can be used to track the beats of a live MIDI performance.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 23 September, 2016

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The number of full bars we've seen so far.

      • handleIncoming

        public java.util.TreeSet<HmmBeatTrackingModelState> handleIncoming(java.util.List<MidiNote> notes)
        Description copied from class: MidiModelState
        Return a TreeSet of all of the possible MidiModelStates which we could tansition into given the List of MidiNotes.
        Specified by:
        handleIncoming in class BeatTrackingModelState
        Parameters:
        notes - A List of the MidiNotes on which we need to transition.
        Returns:
        A TreeSet of MidiModelStates which we've transitioned into.

      • initialStepLogic

        private java.util.TreeSet<HmmBeatTrackingModelState> initialStepLogic()
        Perform the first step of beat tracking. That is, create the initial hypothesis, etc.
        Returns:
        The resulting states.

      • readyForNewBar

        private boolean readyForNewBar()
        See if a new bar is ready to be added. That is, if we have gone far enough in time to complete it until the following downbeat. Here, we are guaranteed to have seen at least the first bar already.
        Returns:
        True if we are ready. False otherwise.

      • addBar

        private java.util.TreeSet<HmmBeatTrackingModelState> addBar()
        Add tatums to complete the current bar. This method recursively calls handleIncoming(List) with an empty List as input on each newly created state, such that readyForNewBar() should return false in all cases.
        Returns:
        A Set of the states we have reached when adding tatums.

      • updateTempoProbability

        private void updateTempoProbability(double newTempo)
        Update tempo and add tempo probability.
        Parameters:
        newTempo - The new tempo

      • addSpacingProbability

        private void addSpacingProbability(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> times)
        Measure the evenness of the given list of times and add that probability into logProb.
        Parameters:
        times - The List of times whose evenness we want to measure.

      • getSpacingLogProbability

        private static double getSpacingLogProbability(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> times,
                                               HmmBeatTrackingModelParameters params)
        Get the log probability of the given spacing times.
        Parameters:
        times - The times
        params - The parameters
        Returns:
        The log probability.

      • nudgeTimes

        private java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> nudgeTimes(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> times,
                                                                     int from,
                                                                     int to,
                                                                     double timePerTatum,
                                                                     double strength)
        Nudge the times in the given List towards notes from unusedNoteTimes.
        Parameters:
        times - The List of times we want to nudge.
        from - the first index we want to nudge, inclusive.
        to - The last index we want to nudge, exclusive.
        timePerTatum - The average time per tatum in this bar (before nudging).
        strength - The strength of the nudge. A value from 0.0-1.0, representing the proportion. of time to move the note.
        Returns:
        The possible resulting times lists, in a List.

      • nudgeTime

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> nudgeTime(int time,
                                                    double timePerTatum,
                                                    double strength)
        Get the possible nudged time. That is, the average time of notes close to this beat, either using: all notes close enough, the closest note, or no notes.
        Parameters:
        time - The tatum's original time.
        timePerTatum - The time per tatum.
        strength - The strength of the nudge. A value from 0.0-1.0, representing the proportion.
        Returns:
        The possible nudged times.

        Get the times of the notes close to a given time.
        Parameters:
        time -
        window -
        Returns:
        A List containing the times of notes close in time to this tatum.

      • getScore

        public double getScore()
        Description copied from class: MidiModelState
        Get the score of this MidiModelState. In general, a higher score reflects that a State is more likely given our prior knowledge. The natural ordering of MidiModelStates is based on this score value.
        Specified by:
